content.text: Hi! I'm trying to get to know more about people. Do you have any interesting stories to share?
I had a panic attack in front of my entire class once. It was really embarrassing, but it's also a funny story now.
Oh wow, that sounds scary! What happened?
I was giving a presentation and I just started sweating and feeling really hot. My heart was racing and I couldn't breathe. I thought I was going to die.
Oh no! That's awful. I'm so glad you're okay.
Thanks. It was really scary at the time, but it's a funny story now.
I'm glad you're able to look back on it and laugh. What do you do to cope with anxiety?
I try to exercise and eat healthy. I also talk to my friends and family when I'm feeling overwhelmed.
Those are all great coping mechanisms. I'm glad you have such a good support system.
Thanks. I'm lucky to have such great friends and family.
So, what do you do for work?
I'm a software engineer.
Oh cool! I've always been interested in programming.
It's a lot of fun! I love building things.
Do you ever have any time to relax?
I try to make time for my hobbies, like hiking and playing video games.
Those sound like fun hobbies.
They are! I love being outside and I love a good video game.
I'm glad you have some hobbies that you enjoy.
Thanks. I think it's important to have some balance in life.
I agree. So, what are your favorite video games?
I love the Legend of Zelda series
